title: What Did Race Bikes Look Like in 1988? Bobby Julich’s 7-Eleven Junior Development Team Huffy/Serotta Bike Check
content:
Bobby Julich raced for two decades on a number of different bikes. We’re taking a closer look at the ones he decided to keep.

Read the full article at What Did Race Bikes Look Like in 1988? Bobby Julich’s 7-Eleven Junior Development Team Huffy/Serotta Bike Check on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
